resource: 1002045.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002045.description=The navigation system is designed to assist in locating an address or point of interest. Discrepancies may be encountered between the system and your actual location. Road system changes may affect the accuracy of the information provided. Rely on your common sense to decide whether to follow a specified route. Detailed coverage not available in every city or roadway. Periodic updates available at an additional cost. See your Navigation System Owner's Manual for further details. 1002045.vtc=true 1002045.derived=false
